Package edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.algorithm.code.macro

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Function<P,R>
    Represents a simple function that can be later called with a parameter of type P to get a result of type R and that doesn't throw any checked exceptions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FetchingMacro
    A macro of the form:
    name variable;
    Macro
    Represents a macro that replaces some section of algorithm code with proper Java code.
    Macros
    The macros used in preprocessing.
    MacroUtil
    Manager class for Macros
    MacroUtil.NestedRegexResult  
    Pair<E1,E2>
    A type-safe, fixed-length pair of two objects; pretty self-explanatory.
    ParameterizedMacro
    A macro of the form:
    name(param1, param2, ... )
    SimpleReplacementMacro
    A Macro that just replaces each match with a replacement string.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MacroUtil.IdentifierPartLocation  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MalformedMacroException
    Custom exception thrown for malformed Macros
